command.script:
GIT_BASE=/tmp/git GIT_REPO=/home/rundeck/ REPO_NAME=sawtooth-core GIT_USER_NAME=lntdev GIT_USER_PASSWORD=Intel@123 GIT_CLONE_URL=https://github.com/lntdev/sawtooth-core.git
if [ ! -d "$GIT_BASE" ]; then echo "$RD_OPTION_BRANCH_NAME does not exists. Creating directory and cloning the $RD_OPTION_BRANCH_NAME" mkdir $GIT_BASE cd $GIT_BASE git clone $GIT_CLONE_URL cd $GIT_BASE/$REPO_NAME git checkout rest_api_testing else cd $GIT_BASE/$REPO_NAME git reset --hard origin/rest_api_testing git stash git rebase git checkout rest_api_testing git pull fi
